text:
I don't get why people would think that they can fool
someone just because only their eyes are covered.
It's pretty crazy even without thinking, don't you think?

I'm surprised you flipped sides that quickly.
Though... I guess you're right...

──And since you're my producer, then there's no way you
wouldn't know that it's Mitsumine, right?

...I can hold you responsible for playing that little
game on me just now?
